form.label: Listeners
form.description: Information on number of listeners tuning in to each show and mount point.

search.query: [ rest /services/configs/conf-inputs | where 'eai:acl.app'="icecast_app" | fields index ] sourcetype=icecast-error | fields mountpoint | dedup mountpoint

panel.title: Average Listeners on Selected Mountpoint per Show

search.query: [ rest /services/configs/conf-inputs | where 'eai:acl.app'="icecast_app" | fields index ] sourcetype=icecast-error event_type=listener-count mountpoint=$mountpoint$ | eval hour = strftime(_time, "%H"), day = lower(strftime(_time, "%A")) | lookup schedule.csv time as hour | eval showname = case(day = "sunday", sunday, day = "monday", monday, day = "tuesday", tuesday, day = "wednesday", wednesday, day = "thursday", thursday, day = "friday", friday, day = "saturday", saturday) | append [ inputlookup schedule.csv | untable time day showname | fields showname | dedup showname ] | stats avg(listener_count) as "Average Listeners" by showname | eval "Average Listeners" = round('Average Listeners', 2) | fillnull value=0

[ rest /services/configs/conf-inputs | where 'eai:acl.app'="icecast_app" | fields index ] sourcetype=icecast-error event_type=listener-count | timechart avg(listener_count) by mountpoint | fillnull value=0
